name: Klötzchen
description:
Klötzchen - or stones - is a non-violent tactical game where you have to push these sweet little stones together, to eliminate them - truly non violent :)

Klötzchen is a puzzle based game with several tactical features:

  • open doors with switches
  • push stones like in Sokoban
  • build bridges
  • different undergrounds with different behaviour
  • up to 4 levels and so on

Push the stones on the playing field with different undergrounds which make your game difficult.

You will have to find your way through doors, portals and you have to solve puzzles, build bridges and so on.

Be careful! Be sure that you find all stones in all levels before you push the last ones together!
